medical_history.chief_complaint: Differentiated thyroid carcinoma (DTC) in patients with germline DICER1 mutations.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patients had a history of pleuropulmonary blastoma diagnosed in infancy, subsequently developed thyroid abnormalities including goiter and nodules. The patients underwent chemotherapy and surgeries, with thyroid carcinoma diagnosed at various ages following initial cancer treatments, and somatic mutations identified in thyroid carcinoma.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with pleuropulmonary blastoma (PPB) in infancy for all cases; treated with chemotherapy. One patient also had a history of a ciliary body medulloepithelioma.
medical_history.family_history: Mother of one patient had hypothyroidism; otherwise, family history of thyroid disease is not specified.
